SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PP_TB
LEFT JOIN CMPY_TB ON PP_TB.CMPY_SEQ = CMPY_TB.CMPY_SEQ LEFT JOIN CMPY_MNG_TB ON PP_TB.CMPY_MNG_SEQ = CMPY_MNG_TB.CMPY_MNG_SEQ AND CMPY_MNG_TB.STATE != 'D'
WHERE 1=1
and ifnull(CMPY_TB.CMPY_CODE,'9999') = #{item.searchWord}
and FN_GET_SEQSTRING('PP',PP_YM,'',PP_SEQ) like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and IFNULL(CMPY_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and IFNULL(CMPNY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and PRDCT_NAME like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and MODEL_NAME like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and FN_MEM_NAME(PP_TB.ins_mem_id) like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and date_format(PP_TB.ins_dt, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no, lst.* FROM ( SELECT
FN_GET_SEQSTRING ('PP',PP_YM,'',PP_SEQ) ppId, DATE_FORMAT (PP_TB.INS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') INS_DT_STR, IFNULL (FN_CODE_NAME(CMPY_CODE,'PT'), '미등록') CMPY_TYPE, IFNULL (CMPY_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') cmpyTitle,
CMPNY_NAME, MNFCT_CMPNY, MNFCT_CNTRY, PRDCT_NAME, MODEL_NAME, BL, HS_CD, IM_QTY, UNIPASS, IFNULL (REQ_NUMBER, '') REQ_NUMBER,
IFNULL (FN_MEM_NAME(PP_TB.INS_MEM_ID), '') INS_NAME, FN_LAST_PP_MENO(PP_TB.pp_ym, PP_TB.pp_seq) LAST_MEMO,
DATEDIFF (CURRENT_DATE(), PP_TB.INS_DT) addDay, DATE_FORMAT (DATE_ADD(PP_TB.INS_DT, INTERVAL 60 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') dDay,
QUO_ID FROM PP_TB
LEFT JOIN CMPY_TB ON PP_TB.CMPY_SEQ = CMPY_TB.CMPY_SEQ LEFT JOIN CMPY_MNG_TB ON PP_TB.CMPY_MNG_SEQ = CMPY_MNG_TB.CMPY_MNG_SEQ AND CMPY_MNG_TB.STATE != 'D'
INNER JOIN (SELECT @rownum:=0) r
WHERE 1=1
and ifnull(CMPY_TB.CMPY_CODE,'9999') = #{item.searchWord}
and FN_GET_SEQSTRING('PP',PP_YM,'',PP_SEQ) like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and IFNULL(CMPY_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and IFNULL(CMPNY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and PRDCT_NAME like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and MODEL_NAME like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and FN_MEM_NAME(PP_TB.ins_mem_id) like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
and date_format(PP_TB.ins_dt, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY PP_TB.INS_DT ASC ) lst ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT #{pageUnit} OFFSET #{firstIndex};

SELECT PP_SEQ, QUO_ID, IFNULL ((SELECT cmpy.CMPY_CODE FROM CMPY_TB cmpy WHERE cmpy.CMPY_SEQ = PP_TB.CMPY_SEQ),'') cmpy_code, PP_TB.CMPY_SEQ, IFNULL (CMPY_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') cmpyTitle, CMPY_MNG_SEQ, CMPNY_NAME, PP_TB.RPRSN, IFNULL(FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(RPRSN_PHONE),'') RPRSN_PHONE, RPRSN_EMAIL, CONTACT, IFNULL(FN_GET_PHONE_FORMAT(CONTACT_PHONE),'') CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_EMAIL, MNFCT_CMPNY, MNFCT_CNTRY, MNFCT_ADRES, PRDCT_NAME, MODEL_NAME, BL, HS_CD, IM_QTY, UNIPASS, REQ_NUMBER, PP_TB.MEMO FROM PP_TB LEFT JOIN CMPY_TB ON PP_TB.CMPY_SEQ = CMPY_TB.CMPY_SEQ WHERE PP_YM = SUBSTRING(#{ppId},3,2) AND PP_SEQ = SUBSTRING(#{ppId},6,4)

SELECT PP_HIS_SEQ, MEMO, DATE_FORMAT (INS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') insDtStr, CONCAT_WS ('_', fn_dept_name(INS_MEM_ID),fn_mem_name(INS_MEM_ID)) insMem FROM PP_HIS_TB WHERE PP_YM = SUBSTRING(#{ppId},3,2) AND PP_SEQ = SUBSTRING(#{ppId},6,4) ORDER BY PP_HIS_SEQ desc

SELECT ifnull(max(PP_SEQ),0)+1 FROM PP_TB WHERE PP_YM = date_format(now(), '%y')
INSERT INTO PP_TB ( PP_YM, PP_SEQ, QUO_ID, CMPY_SEQ, CMPY_MNG_SEQ, CMPNY_NAME, RPRSN, RPRSN_PHONE, RPRSN_EMAIL, CONTACT, CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_EMAIL, MNFCT_CMPNY, MNFCT_CNTRY, MNFCT_ADRES, PRDCT_NAME, MODEL_NAME, BL, HS_CD, IM_QTY, UNIPASS, REQ_NUMBER, MEMO, INS_MEM_ID, UDT_MEM_ID ) VALUES ( date_format(now(), '%y'), #{ppSeq}, #{quoId}, #{cmpySeq}, #{cmpyMngSeq}, #{cmpnyName}, #{rprsn}, #{rprsnPhone}, #{rprsnEmail}, #{contact}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{mnfctCmpny}, #{mnfctCntry}, #{mnfctAdres}, #{prdctName}, #{modelName}, #{bl}, #{hsCd}, #{imQty}, #{unipass}, #{reqNumber}, #{memo}, #{insMemId}, #{udtMemId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PP_TB SET QUO_ID = #{quoId}, CMPY_SEQ = #{cmpySeq}, CMPY_MNG_SEQ = #{cmpyMngSeq}, CMPNY_NAME = #{cmpnyName}, RPRSN = #{rprsn}, RPRSN_PHONE = #{rprsnPhone}, RPRSN_EMAIL = #{rprsnEmail}, CONTACT = #{contact}, CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone}, CONTACT_EMAIL = #{contactEmail}, MNFCT_CMPNY = #{mnfctCmpny}, MNFCT_CNTRY = #{mnfctCntry}, MNFCT_ADRES = #{mnfctAdres}, PRDCT_NAME = #{prdctName}, MODEL_NAME = #{modelName}, BL = #{bl}, HS_CD = #{hsCd}, IM_QTY = #{imQty}, UNIPASS = #{unipass}, REQ_NUMBER = #{reqNumber}, MEMO = #{memo}, UDT_DT = NOW(), STATE = 'U', UDT_MEM_ID = #{udtMemId} WHERE PP_YM = substring(#{ppId},3,2) AND PP_SEQ = substring(#{ppId},6,4);
